meanings.definition: To give a brief statement of the main points of something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys summarising stories for her friends.
meanings.sent2: I will be summarising the key points of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried summarising its adventures to the dog.
meanings.sent4: Her smile summarised the joy of the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's summarising technique made the lesson easy to remember.

meanings.definition: To make a summary of something.
meanings.sent1: He is summarising the novel for his book report.
meanings.sent2: We need to start summarising the research findings.
meanings.sent3: The robot is summarising the instructions in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: The sunset summarised the beauty of the day.
meanings.sent5: The infographic summarising the data was very helpful.
